Is there no foundation for VerusCoin?
Actually, there is a foundation for VerusCoin. The formation of The Verus Coin Foundation is mentioned, which has a vision of PBaaS (Private Blockchain as a Service).

Get involved in Verus and the Verus community:
Visit https://veruscoin.io
